speaker.name: Stefan Hodges-Kluck
speaker.title: Software Engineer at Very Good Ventures
speaker.bio: A software engineer with five years' experience working on full stack web and mobile applications in Dart/Flutter, .NET, Angular, Ionic, and React. In his current role, Stefan develops Flutter code for enterprise-level businesses while enforcing and strengthening best practices for testing and maintainability.

talk.title: Supercharging Development with Full Stack Dart and AWS
talk.description: When building a product today, engineering teams need to use the building blocks they have to level up their team and get to market quickly and safely. One way we have seen this done is to adopt the use of Dart on the backend to ensure your frontend and backend developers are literally speaking the same language and can easily share code between systems without sacrificing performance. In this session we will dive into the logistics behind this and show it in practice with AWS. With the speed and flexibility that Amplify and Dart offer, we can easily connect AWS Cloud Services with a robust full stack application. We will demonstrate how you can create this stack from scratch but also link up your existing cloud infrastructure so you can start building in this setup now, instead of waiting for your next project. Come learn how AWS Amplify and Dart Frog can supercharge your development team today.

speaker.name: Tom Arra
speaker.title: Director of Product Development at Very Good Ventures
speaker.bio: As the Director of Product Development at Very Good Ventures, Tom Arra has overseen the development of Dart Frog into a fully-fledged solution for backend Dart solutions. He has delivered talks on the capabilities of backend Dart at Google Cloud Next and Full Stack Flutter, and is involved in triaging issues and prioritizing updates for the framework. He has been part of the Flutter community since 2019 and his time at BMW.
